emailConfirmationSent: An email with a confirmation link has been sent to your email address. Please check your inbox.

tooltips.passwordRequirements: Password must be at least 8 characters long, include an uppercase letter, a number and symbols(@, #, $, etc.)

textInfoNewPassword: If you successfully change your password, you will be unlogged and redxirected automatically to the login page, where you will need to enter a new password.
resetPasswordDialogTitle: Do you want to change your password?
